incidents.name: On Call Engineers Are Investigating an Issue Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the Twilio console issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Twilio Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers Are Investigating an Issue Twilio Console for account closure

incident_updates.body: Twilio Console in Self-service account closure is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue of erroneous SID being added to the email reply upon self-service request for account closure when using Twilio console and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Twilio console for account closure. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Unaccounted Charges for PAYGO Accounts

incident_updates.body: Twilio PAYGO accounts billing issues on 01/24/2024 at 11:53 AM PST. During this period of time, customers may have experienced delayed recharges to their accounts. The issue has now been resolved.
We are confirming whether recharges were erroneous. Our billing team is investigating customer balances.  We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing erroneous automatic recharges to some accounts on Jan 24, 2024 for amounts that exceed their actual usage as well as their set recharge trigger amounts on the Twilio platform. Customers may not see account balance being reflected real time after a payment is made. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with accounts erroneously charged. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have additional information.

incidents.name: 20404 Errors Using Lookup API

incident_updates.body: Twilio Lookup API was degraded for 25 hours and 32 minutes between 06:00 on 01/24/2024 and 07:32 on 01/25/2024 on Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have experienced 20404 errors when querying numbers outside US using “CountryCode” parameter. The issue has now been resolved.
We've become aware of a potential issue with Lookup API. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Voice Call Failures to Multiple Networks in Venezuela

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting voice calls to multiple networks in Venezuela has now been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

We have started seeing recovery for voice calls to multiple networks in Venezuela. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to observe voice call failures to multiple networks in Venezuela. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to observe voice call failures to multiple networks in Venezuela. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing voice call failures to multiple networks in Venezuela. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential call failures to multiple networks in Venezuela. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to H3G Network in Indonesia

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to H3G Network in Indonesia. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to H3G Network in Indonesia. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to H3G Network in Indonesia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to H3G Network in Indonesia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
